subject: Baseball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Rookie Joba Chamberlain was suspended for two games and fined an undisclosed amount after being thrown out of Thursday’s game for firing two fastballs over the head of Boston’s Kevin Youkilis.
snippet: Rookie Joba Chamberlain was suspended for two games and fined an undisclosed amount after being thrown out of Thursday’s game for firing two fastballs over the head of Boston’s Kevin Youkilis.
